name: Krampus Delivery
description:
This year Santa got a virus, so Krampus should do all the delivery to save Christmas!

It's a simple runner, use arrow keys or A-S to to move left-right, SPACE or ENTER to jump! Mouse click to start and open a box(on a end screen).

We wish you a Merry Christmas and Happy New Year!

'Krampus Delivery' team: Alexey Grishchenko [design], Andrey Efremenko [art], RedTeapot [programming], Polumrak [music]
